description: The contracting entity is soliciting industry feedback on the draft Request For Proposal (RFP) documents for the Ground Based Optical (GBO) Capability of the Surveillance of Space 2 (SofS2) Project.  This is a Request for Information (RFI) and not a Request for Proposal (RFP).
full_summary:
# Ground-Based Optical (GBO) Capability Request for Information (RFI)

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites industry stakeholders to provide feedback on the draft Request For Proposal (RFP) documents for the Ground-Based Optical (GBO) Capability of the Surveillance of Space 2 (SofS2) Project.

## Project Overview

The GBO Capability aims to provide a comprehensive optical-based surveillance system for the SofS2 Project. This initiative is part of a larger strategy to enhance the country's space surveillance capabilities.

## Request for Information (RFI)

The RFI is an open process, allowing industry stakeholders to provide their insights and expertise on the RFP documents. Participation in the RFI is not mandatory, and respondents will not be reimbursed for any costs incurred.

## Key Details

* The RFI is for informational purposes only and is not a call for tender or a Request for Proposal (RFP).
* No agreement, procurement tool, or contract will be entered into based on the RFI.
* Participation in the RFI does not guarantee participation in any future work or procurement process.
* The RFI is an open process, with no short-listing of potential suppliers.

## Important Dates

* The RFI will close on July 5, 2024, at 14:00 EDT.

## Contracting Overview

* The project is managed by Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC).
* The Department of National Defence (DND) is the end-user entity for the project.

## Contact Information

* Lisa Plante (SPAC/PSPC) can be reached at [lisa.plante@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lisa.plante@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) for any inquiries about the RFI.

## Notice URL

The RFI notice can be accessed through the following URL: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19664917?extsite=MTk2NjQ5MTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19664917?extsite=MTk2NjQ5MTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
